thread.title: KFC's Chizza chicken pizza is a bad case of expectations vs reality
thread.title_full: KFC's Chizza chicken pizza is a bad case of expectations vs reality - Business Insider

author: Tom Murray
title: KFC's Chizza chicken pizza is a bad case of expectations vs reality

organizations.name: kfc fast food fried chicken pizza twitter

text:
Expectations were high. KFC
Fried chicken and pizza, combined into a Frankenstein's monster of fast food.
What could possibly go wrong?
KFC's publicity photos for the new"Chizza" product are saliva-inducing, if you like the idea of "chicken ham" on a fried-chicken base with tomato sauce, "Signature KFC Cheese Sauce," mozzarella and â we're not making this up â pineapple chunks.
Unfortunately for beguiled diners, expectations have not quite aligned with reality.
The saucy chicken hybrid is currently only available in the Philippines. It is supposed to look like this:
KFC
But these reactions on Twitter show something different:
expectations vs reality pic.twitter.com/eX3xa81l5J
â đż (@xylxx) February 8, 2017 In the promo shot, Chizza looks like a coherent product ...
@kfc oh nah I need answers ASAP!!!! pic.twitter.com/QTbQnxTLw8
â issa no from me (@JoeThe5how) February 8, 2017 But in reality ...
pay my tuition and ill take this down @kfc pic.twitter.com/BnbvcokiPh
â jack (@scobes) February 9, 2017 ... It is sometimes served like a random, unconnected pile of ingredients.Â
Why u lyinnnn fk u pic.twitter.com/xmmz585RNU
â Zaxh (@JoelZacharyy) February 8, 2017 Undeterred by the reception on Twitter, KFC told The Express : "Weâre always looking to introduce delicious new products to our menu, and are really excited about the incredible response Chizza has received around the world. Keep your eyes peeled!"
